document_data.name: ''Ioun Stone of Regeneration''
document_data.mainbody: An '''''ioun stone of regeneration''''' was a wondrous item that helped their owners to rapidly heal themselves.
document_data.Description: Like other ''[[ioun stone]]s, ioun stones of regeneration'' floated around their masters' heads. This particular type of ''ioun stone'' had a shape of a white elongated crystal.
document_data.Powers: ''Ioun stones of regeneration'' granted their owners the boon of healing. The regenerative magics were so potent the ''ioun stone'' could pull its master from death's door.
document_data.History: One of these [[enchanted]] stones came to the [[Sword Coast]] from [[Chult]]. An ''ioun stone of regeneration'' belonged to a [[yuan-ti malison]] overlord who at some point came into conflict with [[Raika]], a [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] from [[North Faerûn]]. She killed the overlord twice in the same battle and claimed his ''ioun stone''.
